mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JIRA_00_ISSUE([ISSUE_ID], [ISSUE_KEY], [ISSUE_NAME], [EKP_ISSUE_NO], [ISSUE_TYPE], [DOMAIN] ,[STATUS], [START_TIME], [END_TIME], [BUSINESS_OWNER], [BUSINESS_COST] ,[DEVELOP_OWNER], [DEVELOP_COST], CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, FINISH_FLAG) VALUES(#{ISSUE_ID}, #{ISSUE_KEY}, #{ISSUE_NAME}, #{EKP_ISSUE_NO}, #{ISSUE_TYPE}, #{DOMAIN} , #{STATUS}, convert(datetime, #{START_TIME}, 120), convert(datetime, #{END_TIME}, 120) , #{BUSINESS_OWNER}, #{BUSINESS_COST}, #{DEVELOP_OWNER},#{DEVELOP_COST}, GETDATE(), NULL, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 I.* FROM JIRA_00_ISSUE I WHERE I.ISSUE_KEY LIKE ('%' + #{ISSUE_KEY} + '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JIRA_00_DASHBOARD_ISSUE(DASHBOARD_ID, ISSUE_KEY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) VALUES(#{DASHBOARD_ID}, #{ISSUE_KEY}, GETDATE(), GETDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT I.ISSUE_ID, I.ISSUE_KEY, ISNULL(I.EKP_ISSUE_NO, '') AS EKP_ISSUE_NO , CONVERT(varchar(100), I.START_TIME, 120) AS CREATE_TIME , ISNULL(BUSINESS_OWNER,'') AS BUSINESS_OWNER , ISNULL(DEVELOP_OWNER,'') AS DEVELOP_OWNER , ISNULL(BUSINESS_COST, 0.0) AS BUSINESS_COST , ISNULL(DEVELOP_COST, 0.0) AS DEVELOP_COST FROM JIRA_00_ISSUE I WHERE I.FINISH_FLAG = 0

SELECT I.ISSUE_ID as issueId , I.ISSUE_KEY as issueKey , I.ISSUE_NAME as issue , ISNULL(I.EKP_ISSUE_NO, '') AS ekpIssueNo , STATUS AS status , DOMAIN AS territory , CONVERT(varchar(100), I.START_TIME, 120) AS startTime , CASE WHEN I.END_TIME IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONVERT(varchar(100), I.END_TIME, 120) END AS endTime , ISNULL(BUSINESS_OWNER,'') AS businessOwner , ISNULL(DEVELOP_OWNER,'') AS developOwner , ISNULL(BUSINESS_COST, 0.0) AS businessCost , ISNULL(DEVELOP_COST, 0.0) AS developCost FROM JIRA_00_ISSUE I, JIRA_00_DASHBOARD_ISSUE DI WHERE I.ISSUE_KEY = DI.ISSUE_KEY AND DI.DASHBOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND I.START_TIME between convert(datetime, #{startTime}, 120) and convert(datetime, #{endTime}, 120)

SELECT TOP 10 I.ISSUE_KEY as issueKey , I.ISSUE_NAME as issueSummary , ISNULL(I.EKP_ISSUE_NO, '') AS ekpIssueNo , STATUS AS status , DOMAIN AS territory , ISSUE_TYPE AS issueType , ISNULL(BUSINESS_OWNER,'') AS username , ISNULL(BUSINESS_COST, 0.0) AS estimateTime FROM JIRA_00_ISSUE I, JIRA_00_DASHBOARD_ISSUE DI WHERE I.ISSUE_KEY = DI.ISSUE_KEY AND DI.DASHBOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND I.START_TIME between convert(datetime, #{startTime}, 120) and convert(datetime, #{endTime}, 120) ORDER BY ISNULL(BUSINESS_COST, 0.0) DESC

SELECT TOP 10 I.ISSUE_KEY as issueKey , I.ISSUE_NAME as issueSummary , ISNULL(I.EKP_ISSUE_NO, '') AS ekpIssueNo , STATUS AS status , DOMAIN AS territory , ISSUE_TYPE AS issueType , ISNULL(DEVELOP_OWNER,'') AS username , ISNULL(DEVELOP_COST, 0.0) AS estimateTime FROM JIRA_00_ISSUE I, JIRA_00_DASHBOARD_ISSUE DI WHERE I.ISSUE_KEY = DI.ISSUE_KEY AND DI.DASHBOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND I.START_TIME between convert(datetime, #{startTime}, 120) and convert(datetime, #{endTime}, 120) ORDER BY ISNULL(DEVELOP_COST, 0.0) DESC
